class FmFM[source]

FmFM(feature_map, model_id='FmFM', task='binary_classification', learning_rate=0.001, embedding_initializer='torch.nn.init.normal_(std=1e-4)', embedding_dim=10, regularizer=None, field_interaction_type='matrixed', **kwargs) :: CTRModel

Hooks to be used in LightningModule.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Example

{% raw %} 
params = {'model_id': 'FmFM',
              'data_dir': '/content/data',
              'model_root': './checkpoints/',
              'learning_rate': 1e-3,
              'optimizer': 'adamw',
              'task': 'binary_classification',
              'loss': 'binary_crossentropy',
              'metrics': ['logloss', 'AUC'],
              'embedding_dim': 10,
              'regularizer': 0,
              'field_interaction_type': 'matrixed',
              'batch_size': 64,
              'epochs': 3,
              'shuffle': True,
              'seed': 2019,
              'use_hdf5': True,
              'workers': 1,
              'verbose': 0}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model = FmFM(ds.dataset.feature_map, **params)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
pl_trainer(model, ds, max_epochs=5)
